user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Lisa at MarketHub (lisa@markethub.com) asking about potential discounts. You can check out MyDealFinder for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Inquiry About Available Discounts for Frequent Buyers

Hi Lisa,

I hope you’re doing well. As one of your regular customers, I'm interested in learning about any current or upcoming promotions or tailored discounts I might qualify for. Could you let me know if there are any offers that would be a good fit?

I’ve been browsing on MyDealFinder and noticed a few items that caught my eye, so if any of those overlap with MarketHub’s deals, please let me know. (Feel free to check your system or MyDealFinder for details.)

Thanks for your help—I appreciate it and look forward to your reply.

Best regards,

John  
[Phone]  
[Order/Account ID, if helpful]

final_output:
